content: 1 single_crochet in last 8 sts total 102 sts round 26 decrease 1 single_crochet in next 15 sts repeat work direction in the brackets around 5 more times total 96 sts round 27 1 single_crochet in next 7 sts decrease 1 single_crochet in next 14 sts decrease repeat work direction in the brackets around 4 more times 1 single_crochet in last 7 sts total 90 sts round 28 decrease 1 single_crochet in next 13 sts repeat work direction in the brackets around 5 more times total 84 sts round 29 1 single_crochet in next 6 sts decrease 1 single_crochet in next 12 sts decrease repeat work direction in the brackets around 4 more times 1 single_crochet in last 6 sts total 78 sts round 30 decrease 1 single_crochet in next 11 sts repeat work direction in the brackets around 5 more times total 72 sts note for the last round round 36 slip_stitch in the last 3 stitches this will help with the ending point less obvious rounds 31 - 36 1 single_crochet in each st around total 72 sts fasten_off weave in the ends congratulations you are finished you made it how amazing is that follow me here youtube https //youtube com/@crochetandcopy ravelry https //www ravelry com/people/crochetandcopy pinterest https //pin it/x5kanby instagram https //www instagram com/invites/contact/ i=1o9z4a0ba9njs&utm_content=mhvk8te @crochet&copy x https //twitter com/crochetandcopy t=fm7hjmbncdwyhbyqvbbnha&s=09 if you need help with this pattern check out my tutorial https //youtu be/1mdiwtojbmk si=b- twfijlgv_rvryr
